Description: Part of the limestone stela of Herakleitos; panel of rosettes above seven lines of Greek text.
Bibliographic references: Nachtergael 2006 / À propos d'une épitaphe chrétienne d'Égypte et des graphies du nom Hèrakleidès (concludes: VI-VIIc(?) Hermonthis(?))
Pelsmaekers 2000-2005 / A Coptic funerary relief with interesting name, in the collection of the British Museum (pp.73-77)
Tudor 2011 / Christian Funerary Stelae of the Byzantine and Arab Periods from Egypt
Acquisition name: Transferred from: Victoria and Albert Museum (Department of Architecture and Sculpture)
